Name: User name
MainTxt1: Many interesting quizzes are waiting for you
MainTxt2: Easily create your own quiz with our simple editor! In just a couple of minutes, you can publish your quiz publicly.
MainTxt3: Compete with your friends to see who can score the most points! Or play alone. How much faster will you collect a lot of points?
MainTxt4: And, this is not an order... Be smarter than me! Improve your mental abilities by playing different quizzes. Let everyone envy you.
MainTxt5: If you have problems, and in your opinion THEY SHOULD NOT BE HERE, then write to me urgently. I will answer you!
MainTxt6: If you have an idea to add something to this project, I will be happy to answer you

PartyTxt1: Quiz are exciting intellectual games where you answer questions from different categories!
PartyTxt2: The goal of the game is to answer correctly and fastest to score more points.
PartyTxt3: Rules: Select a category, answer questions and compete with friends or other players.
PartyTxt4: Welcome to BrainBattle! Good luck and may the best man win!.
